file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: BlueButton 2.0
  version: 1.0.0
  description: "In order to try out the API you'll first need to get an access token and use it in the Authorize -> bearerAuth setting. To get one you can use the [test client](https://sandbox.bluebutton.cms.gov/testclient/), [postman](https://bluebutton.cms.gov/developers/#try-the-api), or your own local setup. The metadata endpoint is unprotected so you can use it without an access code. The metadata results will tell you what query parameters are available for the different fhir endpoints." 
paths:
  /.well-known/openid-configuration:
    get:
      operationId: openIdConfig
      description: ''
      security: []
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
            application/fhir+json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'OIDC Discovery: listing of the OpenID/OAuth endpoints, supported scopes and claims'
      tags:
        - v1
  /v1/fhir/metadata:
    get:
      operationId: fhirMetaData
      description: ''
      security: []
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
            application/fhir+json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'FHIR CapabilityStatement resource'
        '502':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Error: Bad Gateway, e.g. An error occurred contacting the FHIR server'
      tags:
        - v1
  /v1/connect/userinfo:
    get:
      operationId: listopenidconnect_userinfos
      description: ''
      parameters: []
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'OIDC userinfo'
        '401':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Error: Unauthorized, e.g. Authentication credentials were not provided.'
        '403':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Error: Forbidden, e.g. beneficiary does not grant access to PII.'
        '502':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Error: Bad Gateway, e.g. An error occurred contacting the FHIR server'
      tags:
        - v1
  '/v1/fhir/Patient/{resource_id}':
    get:
      operationId: listReadViewPatients
      description: ''
      parameters:
        - name: resource_id
          in: path
          required: true
          description: 'Pateint FHIR resource id, e.g. -20140000000001 (synthetic beneficiary)'
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
            application/fhir+json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Patient FHIR resource'
        '401':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Error: Unauthorized, e.g. Authentication credentials were not provided.'
        '403':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Error: Forbidden, e.g. beneficiary does not grant access to PII.'
        '404':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Error: Not Found, e.g. The requested resource does not exist.'
        '502':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Error: Bad Gateway, e.g. An error occurred contacting the FHIR server'
      tags:
        - v1
  /v1/fhir/Patient/:
    get:
      operationId: listSearchViewPatients
      description: ''
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: identifier
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: 'The patient identifier to search for'
        - in: query
          name: _lastUpdated
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: 'Include resources last updated in the given range'
        - in: query
          name: startIndex
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: 'The offset used for result pagination'
        - in: query
          name: _has:Coverage
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: 'Part D coverage type/year'
        - in: query
          name: cursor
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: 'The cursor used for result pagination'
        - in: query
          name: _id
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: 'The patient identifier to search for'
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
            application/fhir+json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Patient FHIR resources bundle'
        '400':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Error: Bad Request, e.g. the _lastUpdated operator is not valid.'
        '401':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Error: Unauthorized, e.g. Authentication credentials were not provided.'
        '403':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Error: Forbidden, e.g. beneficiary does not grant access to PII.'
        '502':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Error: Bad Gateway, e.g. An error occurred contacting the FHIR server'
      tags:
        - v1
  '/v1/fhir/Coverage/{resource_id}':
    get:
      operationId: listReadViewCoverages
      description: ''
      parameters:
        - name: resource_id
          in: path
          required: true
          description: 'Coverage FHIR resource id, e.g. part-a--20140000000001'
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
            application/fhir+json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Coverage FHIR resource'
        '400':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Error: Bad Request, e.g. Unsupported ID pattern: partd-889999ddddddddddddddddddddd.'
        '401':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Error: Unauthorized, e.g. Authentication credentials were not provided.'
        '404':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Error: Not Found, e.g. The requested resource does not exist.'
        '502':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Error: Bad Gateway, e.g. An error occurred contacting the FHIR server'
      tags:
        - v1
  /v1/fhir/Coverage/:
    get:
      operationId: listSearchViewCoverages
      description: ''
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: beneficiary
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: 'The patient identifier to search for'
        - in: query
          name: _lastUpdated
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: 'Include resources last updated in the given range'
        - in: query
          name: startIndex
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: 'The offset used for result pagination'
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
            application/fhir+json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Coverage FHIR resources bundle'
        '400':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Error: Bad Request, e.g. the _lastUpdated operator is not valid.'
        '401':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Error: Unauthorized, e.g. Authentication credentials were not provided.'
        '502':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Error: Bad Gateway, e.g. An error occurred contacting the FHIR server'
      tags:
        - v1
  '/v1/fhir/ExplanationOfBenefit/{resource_id}':
    get:
      operationId: listReadViewExplanationOfBenefits

        - name: resource_id
          in: path

          description: 'ExplanationOfBenefit FHIR resource id, e.g. pde--105966977'

        '400':
          content:
            application/json:

                items: {}
          description: 'Error: Bad Request, e.g. Unsupported ID pattern: partd238900099.'
        '401':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Error: Unauthorized, e.g. Authentication credentials were not provided.'
        '404':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Error: Not Found, e.g. The requested resource does not exist.'
        '502':
          content:

                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'Error: Bad Gateway, e.g. An error occurred contacting the FHIR server'
      tags:

  /v1/fhir/ExplanationOfBenefit/:
    get:
      operationId: listSearchViewExplanationOfBenefits
      description: ''
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: patient
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: 'The patient identifier to search for'
        - in: query
          name: _lastUpdated
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: 'Include resources last updated in the given range'
        - in: query
          name: excludeSAMHSA
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: 'If true, exclude all SAMHSA-related resources'
        - in: query
          name: service-date
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: 'Include resources that completed in the given range'
        - in: query
          name: startIndex

            type: string
          required: false
          description: 'The offset used for result pagination'
        - in: query
          name: type
          schema:
            type: string
          required: false
          description: 'A list of claim types to include'
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
            application/fhir+json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items: {}
          description: 'ExplanationOfBenefit FHIR resources bundle'
        '400':
          content:

          description: 'Error: Bad Request, e.g. the _lastUpdated operator is not valid.'
        '401':

        '502':

          description: 'Error: Bad Gateway, e.g. An error occurred contacting the FHIR server'

        - in: query

components:
  securitySchemes:
      bearerAuth:            # arbitrary name for the security scheme
        type: http
        scheme: bearer
          
  schemas: {}
servers:
  - url: 'https://sandbox.bluebutton.cms.gov/'
    description: Sandbox server
    variables: {}
security:
    - bearerAuth: []
